devdoc.author: edsphinx
devdoc.details: This contract separates the interaction data logic (e.g., compliance levels) from the SBT token logic for greater security and flexibility.

params.matchId: The ID of the interaction that was upgraded.

constructor.details: On deployment, sets the addresses of the SBT contract and the protocol owner.

createMatchEntry(uint256,address,address.details: Security is enforced by requiring `msg.sender` to be the ProofOfMatch contract, ensuring data entries are only created when an SBT is minted.

params._locationHint: A non-sensitive hint about the interaction (e.g., "Protocol Step A-1").
params._matchId: The unique ID of the interaction to create.
The ID of the interaction to query.

returns._0: The complete Match struct with all its data.

recordInteraction(uint256).details: Security is enforced by the onlyOwner modifier. The compliance leveling logic can be adjusted here in future versions.

params._matchId: The ID of the interaction to update.

devdoc.title: Match Data

MatchUpgraded(uint256,uint8).notice: Emitted when an interaction's compliance level increases.

createMatchEntry(uint256,address,address.notice: Creates the initial data entry for a new on-chain interaction.

getMatchDetails(uint256).notice: Gets all details for a specific on-chain interaction.

matches(uint256).notice: Mapping from an interaction ID (`matchId`) to its detailed data.

owner().notice: The address of the protocol owner (backend/oracle), authorized to log new interactions.

proofOfMatchContract().notice: The address of the main ProofOfMatch (SBT registry) contract.

recordInteraction(uint256).notice: Logs a new follow-up event for an existing interaction, potentially increasing its compliance level.

userdoc.notice: Contract to store and manage dynamic data for on-chain scientific interactions.
